title: Exquisite Polki & Ruby Droplet Earrings - A Touch of Nizam Elegance
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. Features a large Polki diamond with an irregular cut at the top
accented with smaller brilliant-cut diamonds around the frame. A deep red Ruby is centrally placed in a flower-like formation below
surrounded by more brilliant-cut diamonds. Finished with Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: This unique pair of earrings blend traditional Polki diamond craftsmanship with a modern design aesthetic. The Polki diamond is set in a geometric frame, creating a contemporary silhouette. The ruby and diamond cluster adds a touch of traditional South Indian flair, reminiscent of the 'flower motifs' often seen in Temple Jewellery. The settings are meticulously handcrafted, showcasing the skill of our artisans.
colors: The primary colors are a rich yellow gold
complemented by the translucent shimmer of the Polki diamond
the fiery red of the ruby
and the dazzling white of the smaller diamonds. This combination evokes warmth and opulence.
occasions: and grand celebrations. These earrings will also add a touch of regal charm to more modern events and evening wear.
description: This piece is a rare blend of heritage and contemporary design. The use of Polki diamonds, a signature of Mughal and Nizam jewelry, adds significant cultural value. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones ensure both lasting beauty and a valuable investment. Owning these earrings is owning a piece of Hyderabadi history.
